Html:
When running the setup.msi I immediately get the 'Installation Incomplete - The installer was interrupted before DDDSampleNet could be installed. You need to restart the installer to try again.'.

My installation history:

1) I first tried installing without having IIS installed and got the error message saying I had to install IIS first

2) I installed IIS

3) I ran the setup.msi file again, got the above top error, rebooted my computer and tried again, but with the same result.

Solution, anyone?
Could you try again with logging enabled (you can read about enabling Windows Installer logging here) and send the log file?

Here's the log text:

MSI (c) (54:00) [12:05:51:174]: Windows Installer installed the product. Product Name: DDDSampleNet. Product Version: 1.0.0. Product Language: 1033. Manufacturer: HP. Installation success or error status: 1603.

Case solved - I had not installed enabled enough features in the IIS. When I followed the digitizor.com 'How to install IIS server on Win7'-video tutorial everything was installed correctly afterwards.
